main event: A single witness reported sighting a UFO over Amarillo, Texas on July 7, 1966, which appeared to have a flat front and a tail, emitting a white light.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds,The object traveled from the south to the northeast,The object disappeared suddenly like a switch being turned off,The witness was a 35-year-old traveling salesman and had previous UFO sightings,There were no other witnesses corroborating the sighting.
sighted object: UFO with a flat front and a tail, emitting white light
